ygData.subject: Re: faded pages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes place one page by itself in the Tome of Endless Enchantments push the combine button and hope you have a high enough skill to restore it. ... --
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:04 AM 7/9/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>

Yes place one page by itself in the Tome of Endless Enchantments push the
combine button and hope you have a high enough skill to restore it.


>
>i have 2 faded velishoul's tome pages, but they are not numbered.... is
>there any way to restore them so i know, or is it just one page that is
>faded and these are it?
>
>Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 26th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
>-------------------
>tim borrelli
